mapper.insert: insert into book_board (bmnum, bmid, bmtitle, bmcontent, bmhit) values(bmboard_seq.nextval,#{param1},#{param2},#{param3}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from book_board order by bmnum desc
mapper.update: update book_board set bmid=#{param1}, bmtitle=#{param2}, bmcontent=#{param3} where bmnum=#{param4}
mapper.insert: insert into book_replyboard(rbnum, boardnum, rbid, rbcontent) values(replyboard_seq.nextval, #{param1},#{param2},#{param3})
mapper.select: select * from book_replyboard where boardnum = #{param1} order by rbnum asc
